dataSource.name: Jalapeño
dataSource.description: Jalapeño peppers are one of the most common types of hot peppers.

dataSource.name: Sweet Banana Pepper
dataSource.description: Sweet Banana Peppers are a variety of the Hungarian Wax pepper. They generally harvested when yellow or light green, but if grown to maturity will become red.

dataSource.name: Hot Banana Pepper
dataSource.description: Hot Banana Peppers are a variety of the Hungarian Wax pepper. They generally harvested when yellow or light green, but if grown to maturity will become red.

dataSource.name: Carolina Reaper
dataSource.description: One of the world's hottest peppers on the Scoville Scale

dataSource.name: Serrano Pepper
dataSource.description: A common variety of pepper which is generally considered to be twice as hot as a Jalepeno pepper.
